name: Two-Fer Topaz: 5-Line Slots
description:
(Still working out the details for this page)

Enjoy authentic 5-line slot machine action, loosely based on the double diamond brand of slot machines.

I couldn't help but notice how much the playdate looks like a little slot machine, not only because of the crank on the side, but also how the reflective screen resembles those simple little handheld slot machines like the one my grandma always kept in the bathroom... 

Anyway, I figure why not start with a small scope slot machine game to get my feet wet in Lua, and the playdate environment. Feel free to comment and leave any feedback/issues here.

RTFM

  • L or R to decrease or increase credit value
  • Up to view credit payout table
  • ( B ) to cycle through bet pay-lines
  • ( A ) or pull crank in a slot motion to spin
  • Select the "give up" option to reset with $20.00

High Roller Edition

  • High stakes credit values up to $100.00 per credit
  • Access to online leaderboard -- if/when non-season games can use this feature
  • Support an indie developer on Playdate (thank you)

Free Edition

  • Low stakes credit values up to 50¢ per credit
